page.title: 10Transport on Hunshelf II
page.content: Construction has just begun in the south of the area on the A616T Stocksbridge by-pass.This will link Stocksbridge with the M1 motorway.It will run from the eastern end of Underbank reservoir following the line of Hunshelf Road. There will be a new access to the main steelworks.The new trunk road will then extend to the east of Deepcar from where it will link to the M1. The by-pass will greatly ease the traffic problems associated with heavy lorries in Stocksbridge and greatly improve the quality of the residential environment.However,it will become another visual 'scar' on the environment of the Hunshelf scarp slope.
